name: Rick Rack
description:
Have you ever wondered that if you had taken the other option in life, how life would be different ?


The city of Times Ville gets effected by a major event, with it is stuck in a Time Paradox and an Alternate Timeline is created, looping 30 days. All of the citizens of Times Ville are affected, most affected are 17 specific citizens who had taken some choices during these days which directly and indirectly cause the change in the Major Event in play.

Rick Rack is a Time Paradox, city driving game where the player takes control of 15 different people and their lives to change their destiny and resume their lives in the Main Timeline by exiting this Alternate Timeline.

It will be a chain of events that help exit the Alternate Timeline. Can you make those decisions ?
